required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Pharmacokinetics Study of the Effects of GSK2118436 on Warfarin, the Effects of Ketoconazole and Gemfibrozil on GSK2118436, and the Effects of Repeat Doses of GSK2118436 in Subjects With BRAF Mutant Solid Tumors
clinical_study.official_title: A Four-Part, Open-Label Study to Evaluate the Effects of Repeat Dose GSK2118436 on the Single Dose Pharmacokinetics of Warfarin, the Effects of Repeat Dose Oral Ketoconazole and Oral Gemfibrozil on the Repeat Dose Pharmacokinetics of GSK2118436, and the Repeat Dose Pharmacokinetics of GSK2118436 in Subjects With BRAF Mutant Solid Tumors

brief_summary.textblock: GSK2118436 is an orally administered, potent and selective small molecule BRAF inhibitor that is being developed for the treatment of BRAF mutation-positive tumors. This is a 4-part study (in 4 separate cohorts of subjects) designed to examine the interaction potential of GSK2118436, either as a perpetrator (i.e., effect of GSK2118436 on warfarin; Part A) or victim (i.e., effect of other drugs on GSK2118436; Part B: ketoconazole and Part C: gemfibrozil), as well as to evaluate the single and repeat dose pharmacokinetic parameters of GSK2118436 (Part D). A sufficient number of subjects will be screened to obtain approximately 12 evaluable subjects each for Part A, Part B, Part C and Part D. Following completion of this study, subjects may continue dosing with GSK2118436 in the roll-over study, Protocol BRF114144.

primary_outcome.measure: Maximum plasma concentration (Cmax) of S-warfarin with and without GSK2118436
primary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 168 hours after dosing on Day 1 (warfarin alone) and Day 22 (warfarin in combination with GSK2118436)

primary_outcome.measure: Area under the concentration time curve (AUC) of S-warfarin with and without GSK2118436
primary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 168 hours after dosing on Day 1 (warfarin alone) and Day 22 (warfarin in combination with GSK2118436)

primary_outcome.measure: Maximum plasma concentration (Cmax) of GSK2118436 with and without an inhibitor
primary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 12 hours after dosing on Day 18 (GSK2118436 alone) and Day 22 (GSK2118436 in combination with inhibitor)

primary_outcome.measure: Area under the concentration time curve (AUC) of GSK2118436 with and without an inhibitor
primary_outcome.time_frame: Up to12 hours after dosing on Day 18 (GSK2118436 alone) and Day 22 (GSK2118436 in combination with inhibitor)

primary_outcome.measure: Cmax of GSK2118436 and metabolites after single and multiple 75mg HPMC dose
primary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 24 hours after dosing on Day 1 and up to 12 hours after dosing on Day 18

primary_outcome.measure: AUC of GSK2118436 and metabolites after single and multiple 75mg HPMC dose
primary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 24 hours after dosing on Day 1 and up to 12 hours after dosing on Day 18

primary_outcome.measure: Time to Cmax (Tmax) of GSK2118436 and metabolites after single and multiple 75mg HPMC dose
primary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 24 hours after dosing on Day 1 and up to 12 hours after dosing on Day 18

primary_outcome.measure: Half-life of GSK2118436 and metabolites after single 75mg HPMC dose
primary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 24 hours after dosing on Day 1

primary_outcome.measure: Cmax of GSK2118436 and metabolites after single and multiple 150mg HPMC dose
primary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 24 hours after dosing on Day 1 and up to 12 hours after dosing on Day 18

primary_outcome.measure: AUC of GSK2118436 and metabolites after single and multiple 150mg HPMC dose
primary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 24 hours after dosing on Day 1 and up to 12 hours after dosing on Day 18

primary_outcome.measure: Tmax of GSK2118436 and metabolites after single and multiple 150mg HPMC dose
primary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 24 hours after dosing on Day 1 and up to 12 hours after dosing on Day 18

primary_outcome.measure: Half-life of GSK2118436 and metabolites after single 150mg HPMC dose
primary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 24 hours after dosing on Day 1

secondary_outcome.measure: Cmax of R-warfarin with and without GSK2118436
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 168 hours after dosing on Day 1 (warfarin alone) and Day 22 (warfarin in combination with GSK2118436)
Up to 168 hours after dosing on Day 1 (warfarin alone) and Day 22 (warfarin in combination with GSK2118436)
Up to168 hours after dosing on Day 22

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of subjects with adverse events as a measure of safety and tolerability
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From date of first dose to transition to Rollover protocol BRF114144 (22 - 29 days) or study follow up visit if subject does not transition to BRF114144 (approximately 29 - 39 days)

secondary_outcome.measure: Tmax for GSK2118436 with and without an inhibitor
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 12 hours after dosing on Day 18 (GSK2118436 alone) and Day 22 (GSK2118436 in combination with inhibitor)

secondary_outcome.measure: AUC, Cmax, Tmax and trough concentration of GSK2118436 metabolites with and without an inhibitor, and AUC ratio of metabolites to parent
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 12 hours after dosing on Day 18 (GSK2118436 alone) and Day 22 (GSK2118436 in combination with inhibitor)

secondary_outcome.measure: Inhibitor concentrations in combination with GSK2118436
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to12 hours after dosing on Day 22 (GSK2118436 in combination with inhibitor)

secondary_outcome.measure: AUC of R-warfarin with and without GSK2118436
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 168 hours after dosing on Day 1 (warfarin alone) and Day 22 (warfarin in combination with GSK2118436)
Up to 168 hours after dosing on Day 1 (warfarin alone) and Day 22 (warfarin in combination with GSK2118436)
Up to168 hours after dosing on Day 22

secondary_outcome.measure: Trough concentration for GSK2118436 with and without an inhibitor
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 12 hours after dosing on Day 18 (GSK2118436 alone) and Day 22 (GSK2118436 in combination with inhibitor)

secondary_outcome.measure: Cmax of GSK2118436 metabolites with and without an inhibitor
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 12 hours after dosing on Day 18 (GSK2118436 alone) and Day 22 (GSK2118436 in combination with inhibitor)

secondary_outcome.measure: Tmax of GSK2118436 metabolites with and without an inhibitor
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 12 hours after dosing on Day 18 (GSK2118436 alone) and Day 22 (GSK2118436 in combination with inhibitor)

secondary_outcome.measure: Trough concentration of GSK2118436 metabolites with and without an inhibitor
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 12 hours after dosing on Day 18 (GSK2118436 alone) and Day 22 (GSK2118436 in combination with inhibitor)

secondary_outcome.measure: AUC ratio of metabolites to parent with and without an inhibitor
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 12 hours after dosing on Day 18 (GSK2118436 alone) and Day 22 (GSK2118436 in combination with inhibitor)

intervention.description: Warfarin dosed at 15mg on Day 1 and Day 22
Ketoconazole dosed at 400mg daily on Days 19 through 22
Gemfibrozil dosed at 600mg twice daily on Days 19 through 22

link.description: Results for study 113771 can be found on the GSK Clinical Study Register.
